Monster.Name: Jaculi
Monster.Description: Ajaculi (pronounced jah-KOO-lee) is a 15-foot-long snake that can alter the color and texture or its scales to camouflage itself. Altering its appearance to resemble wood or stone, it coils around pillars and tree trunks from which it launches itself like a javelin, striking with great force and accuracy. Jaculis are found in damp climates, and their preferred habitats are rainforests and cool dungeons. The shed skin of the jaculi is coveted for use in crafting boots ofstriding and springing and cloaks ofinvisibility

MonsterTrait.Name: Camouflage
MonsterTrait.Text: The jaculi has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The jaculi has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit. reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spring
MonsterTrait.Text: The jaculi springs up to 30 feet in a straight line and makes a bite attack against a target within its reach. This attack has advantage if the jaculi springs at least 10 feet. If the attack hits, the bite deals an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.
